summary:
## Archangel Michael Trampling Lucifer (Summary)

Guido Reni's painting depicts Archangel Michael, a powerful angel in Christianity and Judaism. Archangels are high-ranking messengers of God. Though often thought of as the highest angels, they're actually the second-lowest rank.  Michael, known as the "Chief of the Heavenly Host," is shown defeating Lucifer, symbolizing good triumphing over evil.

The Bible doesn't have a detailed angel hierarchy, but other texts and traditions give Michael, Gabriel, Raphael, and Uriel special importance.
title: Archangel
